title: Clamps
excerpt: Clamps are elite when it comes to UI and typography, It lets text scale with screen size but never get too small or too huge.
body:
Why it improves UI:

*   Prevents tiny text on phones, massive text on ultrawides
    
*   Removes most media queries
    
*   Keeps visual hierarchy consisten
    
*   Very easily responsive, without the need of @media
    
    The way to use clamps is like this:
    
    ```
    font-size: clamp(min, preferred, max);
    ```
    
    Replace min, preferred and max with values that work for your UI and boom!
